tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 11-49 at 2014 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament (subject to second reshuffle)
tourBios.curYearHigh: Played in 17 Web.com Tour events, making three cuts. Best performance was a T30 in the winds at the Cartagena de Indias at Karibana Championship.
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Finished T28 at the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December after six steady rounds at PGA National...Missed the cut at the Greenbrier Classic, his first career start in a PGA TOUR-sanctioned event.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: First-team All-ACC at Virginia Tech in 2013. Team finished second at the ACC Championships. Was a four-time Virginia Tech Player of the Year.
tourBios.personal: Attended William Monroe High School in Stanardsville, Va., located about 20 miles north of Charlottesville. Hometown has a population of 377 people...Has two sisters and two brothers and they all played high school golf. One brother served three tours of duty in Iraq with the United States Marines and is currently a member of the National Guard. Older sister, Katie, was an All-American second baseman for Christopher Newport University in Newport News, Va...Father, Mike, played in the 1992 PGA Championship at Bellerive CC in St. Louis...Cousin Jay Woodson won the Golf Channel's inaugural Big Break Invitational in early October (2014)...Is a two-time 2A state golf champion...Likes to visit Charleston, S.C...Met actor Bill Murray at the 2012 NCAA Championship in Los Angeles. Would include Murray, Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson in his dream foursome...Favorite sporting event he's attended is the Masters Tournament...Would like to trade places with Justin Timberlake for a day...Says not many people know he was a professional ping pong player...Bucket list includes going deep-sea fishing.

tourBios.curYearHigh: Played in 17 Web.com Tour events, making three cuts. Best performance was a T30 in the winds at the Cartagena de Indias at Karibana Championship.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T30th in 2015 at the Cartagena de Indias at Karibana Championship Presented by Prebuild.
